name: Metaverse Construction Kit
description: The Metaverse Construction Kit is a virtual environment to construct your own 3D creations. Use the twenty-four structural elements to define your structures and then style your creations with sixty-four material types like organics, metals, minerals, and composites. Then Publish!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon X2, or equal at 2.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c-compatible, SM 3.0-compatible, 256MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compatible, 16-bit Additional Notes: For VR: GTX 680 or better
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: QuadCore 2.0 GHz + Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0c-compatible, SM 3.0-compatible, 512MB VRAM+; NVIDIA GeForce 8800 GTS or better DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 8 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c-compatible, 16-bit Additional Notes: For VR: GTX 970 or better

reviews.review_text: i'm a teen that is home school and i'm trying to learn animation and 3D modeling and this a great engine to start learning that stuff i love this

After a recent update, I’ve decided to change my mind. Graphics are amazing, best graphics in a sandbox game I’ve ever seen. Lots of different shapes of 'blocks' to use allowing unique designs. Placing blocks is a bit annoying and could use some work. The menu is very easy to navigate. Tons of textures to use, from plastic to obsidian. I’ll give this game 8/10 for being as good as it is in early access.
